Class QuadList 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----QuadList
public class QuadList
extends Object
A class for lists of quadruples.

Author:
Ethan Georgi

QuadList()
Constructor.

adjustQuad(int, int)
change a quadruple around
enterQuad(int, Quadruple)
make room for a new quadruple
getNext()
get the next segment of the linked list
getQuadSeg(int)
get me a quadruple
repairQuad(int, int)
change a quadruple around
showQuadList()
display the quads we've got so far

QuadList 
 public QuadList()
Constructor.

enterQuad 
 public void enterQuad(int inx,
                       Quadruple quad)
make room for a new quadruple

Parameters:
inx - the index where we should put this
quad - the quadruple to store
repairQuad 
 public void repairQuad(int inx,
                        int qnum)
change a quadruple around

Parameters:
inx - the index of the quadruple to change
qnum - the new result
adjustQuad 
 public void adjustQuad(int inx,
                        int locals)
change a quadruple around

Parameters:
inx - the index of the quadruple to change
locals - the parameter
getQuadSeg 
 public Quadruple getQuadSeg(int n)
get me a quadruple

Parameters:
n - the index of the quadruple you want
Returns:
the quadruple you asked for
getNext 
 public QuadList getNext()
get the next segment of the linked list

Returns:
the next QuadList
showQuadList 
 public void showQuadList()
display the quads we've got so far
